verbose_text: Heparin induced thrombocytopenia (HIT) is a prothrombotic immune reaction to unfractionated and low-molecular-weight heparin (LMWH) products mediated by platelet activating antibodies against complexes of platelet factor 4 (PF4) and heparin.
evidence: heparin (LMWH) products mediated by platelet-activating antibodies
